meanings.definition: A type of plant native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The achira grows tall in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: Many colorful flowers bloom on the achira plant.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys love to swing from the branches of the achira.
meanings.sent4: The achira stands like a guardian of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the achira dance in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A starchy tuberous root used for food.
meanings.sent1: The achira root is delicious when roasted.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest the achira for its nutritious roots.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally mistook the achira for a potato.
meanings.sent4: The achira root is a hidden gem in the culinary world.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking achira fills the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A type of edible flour made from the achira plant.
meanings.sent1: Bakers use achira flour to make gluten-free bread.
meanings.sent2: The achira flour adds a unique flavor to the cake.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they covered each other in achira flour.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked achira bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The achira flour turned the dough a lovely shade of cream.
